reg_pit.title: BC Timber Sales Business Areas Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

reg:regulation.reg:title: BC Timber Sales Business Areas Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: BC Timber Sales Business Areas established

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Babine BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Babine BC timber sales business area".
The Cariboo-Chilcotin BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Cariboo-Chilcotin BC timber sales business area".
The Chinook BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Chinook BC timber sales business area".
The Kamloops BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Kamloops BC timber sales business area".
The Kootenay BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Kootenay BC timber sales business area".
The Okanagan-Columbia BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Okanagan-Columbia BC timber sales business area".
The Peace-Liard BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Peace-Liard BC timber sales business area".
The Prince George BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Prince George BC timber sales business area".
The Seaward/tlasta BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Seaward/tlasta BC timber sales business area".
The Skeena BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Skeena BC timber sales business area".
The Strait of Georgia BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Strait of Georgia BC timber sales business area".
The Stuart-Nechako BC timber sales business area is established as shown on the attached map titled "Stuart-Nechako BC timber sales business area".

bcl:centertext.in:em:
The maps accompanying this regulation are exempt from publication and may be seen at
the J.T. Fyles Natural Resources Library, 1810 Blanshard St., Main Floor,
Victoria, B.C. V8W 9N3. Call Number: 346.04675 B849 2016.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Forest Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 157, section 151.1]

change.changenote: Schedule exemption note BEFORE amended by BC Reg 88/2016, effective April 1, 2016.

bcl:centertext.in:em:
The maps accompanying this regulation are exempt from publication and may be seen at
the Registries Department, Surveyor General Branch, Ministry of Sustainable Resource Management,
#3 - 3400 Davidson Avenue, Victoria, B.C. V8W 9M5.
